data.title: MMFF 2013 – List of Winners
data.meta_description: The Robin Padilla-starrer "10,000 Hours" emerged as the biggest winner during the awards night of the 39th Metro Manila Film Festival on Thursday night, December 27, at the Meralco Theater. "10,000 Hours" dominated this year's MMFF by bagging the major awards including Best Picture, Best Actor for Robin Padilla and Best Director for Bb. Joyce…
data.text:
The Robin Padilla-starrer "10,000 Hours" emerged as the biggest winner during the awards night of the 39th Metro Manila Film Festival on Thursday night, December 27, at the Meralco Theater.

“10,000 Hours” dominated this year’s MMFF by bagging the major awards including Best Picture, Best Actor for Robin Padilla and Best Director for Bb. Joyce Bernal.

The Best Actress trophy went to Maricel Soriano for “Girl Boy Bakla Tomboy.”

The New Wave category, on the other hand, was dominated by “Dukit.”

Here is the complete list of winners for the Main and New Wave categories of the 39th Metro Manila film Festival:

MAIN CATEGORY

Best Float Award:

“Boy Golden”

Youth Choice Award:

“Pagpag Siyam na Buhay”

Best Child Performer:

Ryzza Mae Dizon, “My Little Bossings”

Best Festival Sound Recording:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Musical Score:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Original Theme Song:

“My Little Bossings”

Best Makeup:

“Pagpag”

Best Visual Effects:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Editing:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Cinematography:

“10,000 Hours”

Gender Sensitive Award Main Category:

“Girl, Boy, Bakla, Tomboy”

Special Recognition Award:

Ronnie Ricketts

FPJ Memorial Award for Film Excellence:

“10,000 Hours”

Mavshack Male Star of the Night:

Daniel Padilla

Mavshack Female Star of the Night:

Eugene Domingo

Best Original Story:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Screenplay:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Director:

Joyce Bernal, “10,000 Hours”

Best Supporting Actor:

Pen Medina, “10,000 Hours”

Best Supporting Actress:

Aiza Seguerra, “My Little Bossings”

Gat Puno Antonio Villegas Cultural Award:

“10,000 Hours”

Best Actress:

Maricel Soriano, “Girl Boy Bakla Tomboy”

Best Actor:

Robin Padilla, “10,000 Hours”

3rd Best Picture:

“My Little Bossings”

2nd Best Picture:

“Girl Boy Bakla Tomboy”

Best Picture:

“10,000 Hours”

NEW WAVE CATEGORY

New Wave Student Short Film Special Jury Prize:

#NoFilter, Mapua Institute of Technology

New Wave Short Film Best Picture:

“Ang Paglisan”

Best New Wave Film:

“Dukit” by Armando Lao

Animation Jury Prize:

“Ang Lalong ni Kulakog”

Animation Best Picture:

Kaleh and Mbaki

Best New Wave Film Director:

Armando Lao, “Dukit”

New Wave Best Actress:

Agot Isidro

New Wave Best Actor:

Bor Ocampo, Willy Layug, Bambalito Lacap for “Dukit”

New Wave Special Jury Prize:

“Mga Anino ng Kahapon”

New Wave Best Picture:

“Dukit”

Gender Sensitive Award (New Wave):

“Island Dreams”

Gender Sensitive Award – New Wave Student Category:

“Hintayin mo sa Seq. 24”
